sqlDataSet.name: Patients Created During Period
sqlDataSet.sqlQuery: select pn.given_name, pn.family_name, n.gender, n.birthdate, n.date_created, u.username as created_by from patient p, person_name pn, person n, users u where p.patient_id = n.person_id and pn.person_id = n.person_id and u.user_id = n.creator and n.date_created >= :startOfWeek and n.date_created <= :endOfWeek
